With FANUC you're in safe hands. With over 40 million automation products installed worldwide, 25 locations, and a Service First support network that guarantees lifetime support on all FANUC products 24/7 worldwide; you can see why FANUC is trusted by more companies than anyone else.FANUC America attends some of the largest and most exclusive manufacturing and automation tradeshows in the Americas. .Join FANUC America on the Auburn leg of the 2024 Collaborative Robot Workshop tour! Explore the FANUC Collaborative lineup and hear from FANUC experts throughout the event.At MODEX 2024, the premier manufacturing and supply chain experience, qualified buyers come to engage 1:1 with solution providers and supply chain experts like you.Join FANUC America on the Phoenix leg of the 2024 Collaborative Robot Workshop tour! Explore the FANUC Collaborative lineup and hear from FANUC experts throughout the event. FANUC’s  CRX Cobots are safe, flexible, quick to implement, and easy to program. All with FANUC renowned reliability and 8 years of maintenance-free operations. FANUC provides solutions that help companies increase productivity, maximize profits, overcome labor issues and improve their competitive position. Re-evaluating your manufacturing or automation strategy? Have a production problem? Not sure how to solve it? At FANUC we pride ourselves for being problem solvers and we’re here to help. With over 37 years of automation experience our sales team will listen and review automation and efficiency options with you and usually within 30 minutes or less. FANUC America has a product solution for any automation application, including the industry's leading products for industrial robotics, CNCs and factory automation. See FANUC customers share their experience operating, building, retrofitting and automating with FANUC products. Whatever your tasks, whatever your material, industry or market, FANUC provides exactly the right solution for you and for your product. The latest automation press releases and articles by FANUC America.FANUC is the world's leading supplier of automation for manufacturing including robotics, CNCs and Motion Control, and ROBOMACHINE machining centers.FANUC America provides comprehensive technical FANUC CNC training, FANUC robotics training, and FANUC ROBODRILL training, with interactive, instructor-led courses offered at our automation training centers in cities across the

74f48ac1-496b-4c8a-a5f6-831a808e2e5b.text: U.S., as well as online courses so students can learn at their own pace and on their own schedule.At FANUC America, we pride ourselves in having an extremely talented and experienced group of robotic system and CNC system integrators that are part of our FANUC Authorized System Integrator (ASI) Network for automation systems.The future is bright for students who embrace robotics and advanced manufacturingtechnologies. Now more than ever, companies use robots and CNC technologies to maximize productivity and gain a competitive edge. In today's market; however, many struggle to find qualified workers with the right technology skills. FANUC South America currently provides CNC, Laser and Robot sales, as well as repair service and parts support for CNC, Laser, Robot, ROBODRILL and ROBOCUT machines. Headquarters are located in São Paulo, with branch offices in Manaus, Brazil and Buenos Aires, Argentina.Need immediate answers? Contact us directly by phone, e-mail or online form.
